name: Veganana
description:
Veganana

Veganana is an open source 2D mobil platform game developed with Unity2D. 

Get Source Code

Our character is a vegan banana. The aim of the banana is to reach the highest score by eating the fruits. But purple mushrooms poison the banana. He should not miss any fruit. Otherwise, the score will decrease. Have fun! 

Note: Unity2D version is 2020.3.3f1

Controls

Touch:

  • Movement: Left and Right Side
Credits
  • Graphics: Banana Man Sprite Sheet, Sliced Fruits
  • Sounds: Up In My Jam, Pixelland, Coupe
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Thanks to all of the game development community for their awesome help.
